name: L-arginine transport via ABC system (periplasm)

Modified genes: ( b2310 and b2308 and b2306 and b2307 ) or ( b0862 and b0860 and b0864 and b0861 ) or ( b0862 and b0864 and b0863 and b0861 )
Modify reason: ArtI (b0863) is  similar to the ArtJ (b0860) arginine binding periplasmic protein of E. coli.
